name: FUME
description:
FUME is a 2D puzzle and platformer game, based on an illustration fanzine by Kazwes and Club del Prado from 2018.

Made from hand made animations, where the the backgrounds and figures are printed in risograph (a high speed analogic printing system from the 80's),  this game is charged with a retro aesthetic that takes advantage in a beautiful way of the limits of the graphic medium, remembering the collage, comic textures and the quality of printing from independent publishing and fanzines.

FUME combines the old-school dynamics of platformers with lo-fi graphic resources, inspiring mystery and nostalgia with its looks and sounds.

FUME is a project by Luis Cruz and Javier de Azkue with sound and music by Ariel Schlichter.
